languages.text: "Если ваша цепная зверушка сделает хоть шаг к Осколку — миру между нами конец, Вольный Торговец. Осколок отправится в Ярмо, это же существо... Я уничтожу его сразу как завершу работу над Ярмом. Если вы не сделаете это раньше. Вам стоит сделать это раньше". {n}Голос Ксавьера не допускает двойных толкований.{/n}

"If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Если ваша цепная зверушка сделает хоть шаг к Осколку — миру между нами конец, Вольный Торговец. Осколок отправится в Ярмо, это же существо... Я уничтожу его сразу как завершу работу над Ярмом. Если вы не сделаете это раньше. Вам стоит сделать это раньше". {n}Голос Ксавьера не допускает двойных толкований.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "If your chained pet takes so much a step towards the shard, there will be no peace between us anymore, Rogue Trader. The Shard will get into the Yoke, it is a living being... I will destroy it as soon as I finish working on the Yoke. If you will not destroy it before I do. You should do this before I do." {n}Xavier's voice does not allow for double meanings.{/n}

"If your chained pet takes so much a step towards the shard, there will be no peace between us anymore, Rogue Trader. The Shard will get into the Yoke, it is a living being... I will destroy it as soon as I finish working on the Yoke. If you will not destroy it before I do. You should do this before I do." {n}Xavier's voice does not allow for double meanings.{/n}

"If your chained pet takes so much as a step toward the shard, there will be no peace between us anymore, Rogue Trader. The Shard will get into the Yoke, it is a creature— I will destroy it as soon as I finish working on the Yoke. Unless you destroy it before I do. You should do this before I do." {n}Xavier's voice does not presuppose ambiguity.{/n}

"If your chained pet takes so much as a step toward the shard, there will be no peace between us anymore, Rogue Trader. The Shard will get into the Yoke, it is a creature— I will destroy it as soon as I finish working on the Yoke. Unless you destroy it before I do. You should do this before I do." {n}Xavier's voice does not presuppose ambiguity.{/n}

"If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

"If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

languages.text: « Si votre animal dressé fait ne serait-ce qu'un pas vers l'Écharde, notre alliance prendra fin, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'Écharde sera placée sous le Joug. Quant à cette créature... je la détruirai dès que j'aurai terminé mon travail, à moins que vous la détruisiez avant moi... ce qui serait fort avisé, » {n}déclare Xavier d'une voix sans équivoque.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Si votre animal dressé fait ne serait-ce qu'un pas vers l'Écharde, notre alliance prendra fin, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. L'Écharde sera placée sous le Joug. Quant à cette créature... je la détruirai dès que j'aurai terminé mon travail, à moins que vous la détruisiez avant moi... ce qui serait fort avisé, » {n}déclare Xavier d'une voix sans équivoque.{/n}

languages.text: «Si su mascotita encadenada da un solo paso hacia el fragmento, será el fin de nuestra alianza, Comerciante. El fragmento irá al Yugo y destruiré a la criatura en cuanto termine, a menos que la destruya usted antes. Cosa que recomiendo que haga». {n}La voz de Calcazar no deja lugar a la ambigüedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Si su mascotita encadenada da un solo paso hacia el fragmento, ya no habrá paz entre nosotros, Comerciante. El fragmento irá al Yugo. Destruiré a la criatura en cuanto termine con el Yugo, a menos que la destruya usted antes. Cosa que recomiendo que haga». {n}La voz de Xavier no deja lugar a la ambigüedad.{/n}

languages.text: “行商浪人，只要你的小宠物朝那块碎片迈出一步，我们之间的盟约就立刻作废。那块碎片必须锁在圣枷里，至于你那只宠物……等我完成圣枷的工作之后，我就会立刻把它消灭，除非你打算在我之前先杀了它。我建议你这么做。”{n}卡尔卡扎的声音中没有任何模棱两可的余地。{/n}
languages.original_text: "If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “只要你的小宠物朝那块碎片迈出一步，我们之间的和平就会立刻结束，行商浪人。那块碎片是个生物，必须锁在圣枷里。只要我做完圣枷的工作之后，我就会立刻把它毁掉，除非你能在我之间把它毁掉。你确实应该在我之前先动手毁了它。”{n}希维尔的声音中没有任何含混不清的成分。{/n}

languages.text: "Sollte sich Euer Schoßhündchen dem Fragment auch nur einen Schritt nähern, ist unsere Allianz beendet, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Fragment wird unter das Joch gestellt und was diese Kreatur angeht ... Ich werde sie zerstören, sobald meine Arbeit hier getan ist. Es sei denn, Ihr zerstört sie vor mir. Ich rate Euch, genau das zu tun." {n}Calcazars Ton lässt keinen Raum für Unklarheiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Euer angeleintes Haustier auch nur einen einzigen Schritt auf das Fragment zumacht, wird zwischen uns kein Friede mehr herrschen, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Fragment wird in das Joch gelangen, es ist eine Kreatur. Ich werde es zerstören, sobald ich die Arbeit an dem Joch abgeschlossen habe. Es sei denn, Ihr zerstört es vor mir. Ihr solltet das tun, bevor ich es tue." {n}Xaviers Stimme lässt keinen Platz für Mehrdeutigkeit.{/n}

languages.text: 「鎖につながれたペットがシャードに一歩でも近づいたら、我々の同盟は終わりだと思え、自由開拓者。シャードがヨークの制御下に置かれれば、それは生物となる…私はそれを、仕事が終わり次第、すぐに破壊する。お前が先に破壊しない限りな。私が破壊する前に、お前が破壊すべきだ」{n}カルカサルの声には、断固とした響きが感じられた{/n}
languages.original_text: "If your pet takes so much as a step toward the Shard, you may consider our alliance broken, Rogue Trader. The Shard will be placed under the Yoke, and as for that creature... I will destroy it as soon as my work here is complete. Unless you destroy it first. I advise you to do just that." {n}Calcazar's tone leaves no room for ambiguity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「鎖につながれたペットがシャードに一歩でも近づいたら、もう私たちの間に平和は訪れることはないぞ、ローグトレーダー。シャードがヨークに入り込めば、それはクリーチャーとなる…私はそれを、ヨークの仕事が終わり次第、すぐに破壊する。お前が先に破壊しない限りな。私が破壊する前に、お前が破壊すべきだ」{n}ザビエルの声には、断固とした響きが感じられた。{/n}
